hero.title:
Gravity is optional.
 Safety is not.
hero.subtitle: The Engineering of Peace of Mind.
hero.description:
In an industry often driven by agencies without their own fleet and cheap prices competing in a race to the bottom, we are driven by checklists, values and passion. Flying Pictures Mexico is built on a simple philosophy: The thrill belongs in the view, not in the risk. 

Discover why we are the valley's only true Aviation Company.

legacy.subtitle: THE LEGACY
legacy.title: Trusted by Giants.
legacy.description:
For 10 consecutive years, if you looked up and saw the iconic Telcel Balloon floating over Mexico, you were looking at Flying Pictures in action. Major corporations don't trust their brand assets to luck; they trust operational discipline. 
We operated the most visible balloon in the country with a perfect safety record for a decade. 

Once we carefully managed to land the famous giant on a ship on the sea! A mission accomplished thanks to our team of seasoned pilots and operators.
Today, we apply those same corporate aviation standards to your morning flight.

finest.title:

Finest Aircraft.
finest.description:
We treat our balloons like members of the family. We fly exclusively Cameron Balloons. Based in Bristol, UK, Cameron is to ballooning what Rolls-Royce is to engines. 

 They are the world leaders in lighter-than-air technology, holding records for flying around the world and into the stratosphere.

safety.subtitle: SAFETY PROTOCOLS & CONTROL TOWER
safety.title: The Invisible Wall of Safety.
safety.description:
How do we achieve a safety record that spans 30 years? By
 saying "No" when others say "Maybe."

1.title: The "Red Flag" Rule
1.description: If conditions are marginal, we stay grounded. We prefer to refund a ticket than risk a passenger.

2.title: Daily Inspections
2.description: If conditions are marginal, we stay grounded. We prefer to refund a ticket than risk a passenger.

3.title: Private Control Tower
3.description: We are the only company in the valley operating its own internal weather monitoring station. We track wind velocity and direction in real-time.

4.title: Verified Solvency
4.description: We operate with comprehensive liability insurance that exceeds legal requirements

mastery.subtitle: MEET THE CAPTAINS
mastery.title: Mastery Has No Shortcut.
mastery.description: In aviation, respect is earned in hours, not years. Whether they are veterans with decades in the air or rising stars of the sport, every Flying Pictures pilot meets the "Sean Standard."

1.name: Certified Authority
1.description: Every pilot holds a commercial license issued by the AFAC (Agencia Federal de Aviación Civil). We don't employ hobbyists.

2.name: 2,000+ Hours
2.description: The average experience in our cockpit far exceeds the industry requirement.

3.name: The Mentorship Model
3.description: Our younger pilots are not just hired; they are mentored. They fly under the strict supervision of our founders, ensuring the safety culture remains unbroken.

meetGiants.title: Meet Gentle Giants
meetGiants.description: We treat our balloons like members of the family. Each one has a name, a history, and a distinct personality.
meetGiants.subtitle: THE FLAGSHIPS
meetGiants.description2: Designed for stability, comfort, and the Classic Journey.
meetGiants.description3: Designed for agility, intimacy, and Private Ascents.

1.name: Cameron A-315 (The Heavy Lifters)
1.description: Think of them as the "Ocean Liners" of the sky. With a lift capacity of 800kg, these massive envelopes offer the smoothest, most stable flight experience. They are equipped with our signature compartmented baskets, ensuring every guest has their own "corner" for photography.

2.name: Cameron Z-120 (The Racer)
2.description: The "Roadster". The Z-Series features a slightly more aerodynamic shape, allowing for quicker climbs and responsive handling. It is small, fast, and incredibly intimate.

3.name: Cameron Z-160
3.description: The perfect balance between power and privacy. Large enough for a double date or a small family, but small enough to feel like your own private balcony over the pyramids.

banner.title: THE LEGACY SQUADRON
banner.subtitle: The versatile vessels that round out our capability.
banner.cardsubdescription: True to its name, this aircraft is often requested for our most romantic milestones. It has witnessed hundreds of "Yes, I will" moments above the Sun Pyramid.
banner.cardsubdescription2: Named after the ruler of the Andean skies, this vessel is a workhorse of the valley, combining lift power with the majesty of flight.
banner.cardsubdescription3: The agile support fleet, ready to deploy for special events and film logistics.
